name: Stone Game (Mescolar)
description:
Movement: Arrow Keys.

Drop Item: Hold Space and walk away.

Throw Item (You can't throw the cube): q

IF STONE THROWS THE BALL AND YOU TOUCH IT YOU DIE

To win you need to:

Throw the ball at the stone

Get the entire cube red

Throw the ball at the stone while it's laughing

Throw the rabbit at the stone
